subtitles:
185576 188245 - Oh, God...
- Keep your shit together.
188329 191415 If you wanna get 'em out of here.

192249 194919 - I can pop these, no problem.
- So get to it!
209141 211644 Security, we have a break-in. Get the...

220111 222947 I know who you are.
I know what you think...

223030 226867 If you don't wanna get hurt,
keep your mouth shut and don't move.

226951 232206 The chimps are infected. They're highly
contagious. They've been given an inhibitor.

232290 235751 - Infected with what?
- To cure, you must first understand.

244343 247513 - What is he talking about?
- Get the cages open.

249640 253936 Listen, you sick bastard,
we're taking your torture victims with us.
254020 255605 We'll get you out of here.

255688 260359 The animals are contagious. The infection
is in their blood and saliva. One bite...
277710 279837 Get it off! Get it off!

283466 286677 - What's the matter with her?
- You have to kill her!

295353 298564 - What's the matter with her?
- We have to kill her now!

1004228 1007106 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just shut up!

1015239 1017825 - Covered everything.
- Who are those people?

1046479 1048731 - What the fuck is going on?
- Just move!

1078719 1083474 Man walks into a bar with a giraffe.
They each get pissed.

1085643 1090856 The man goes to leave and the barman says
"Oi! You can't leave that lying there. "
1090940 1094986 He says "No, it's not a lion. It's a giraffe".
1105579 1108499 You two should get on like a house on fire.

1115298 1118801 - Are you a doctor?
- He's not a doctor. He's a patient.

1123389 1129812 I was riding a package from Farringdon to
Shaftesbury Avenue and a car cut across me.

1129895 1133649 Then I wake up today in hospital.
I wake up and I'm...

1159216 1165473 It started as rioting, and right from
the beginning you knew this was different.

1165556 1169727 Because it was happening
in small villages, market towns.
1170603 1173356 And then it wasn't on the TV any more.

1173439 1178152 It was in the street outside.
It was coming through your windows.
1182031 1184867 You didn't need a doctor to tell you that.
1187495 1189997 There was something in the blood.

1191457 1196420 By the time they tried to evacuate
the cities, it was already too late.
1203552 1206264 And that's when the exodus started.

1210476 1214146 there were reports of Infection
in Paris and New York.
1216524 1219443 We didn't hear anything more after that.

1222405 1225366 - What's the government doing?
- There's no government.

1227994 1232081 There's always a government.
They're in a bunker or a plane...

1232164 1236460 No, there's no government,
no police, no army.
1237920 1241007 No TV, no radio, no electricity.

1241632 1245803 You're the first uninfected person
we've seen in six days.

1264196 1268200 Look, I have to find them.
They live in Deptford. I can walk it. OK?
1268284 1270870 You'll go and come back, yeah?

1285635 1290056 You never go anywhere alone
unless you've got no choice.

1292558 1296646 Only travel during daylight.
Unless you've got no choice.

1300816 1304403 We'll all go and find
your dead parents together, OK?

1319085 1322254 If you want her to slow down,
you'll have to say.

1486627 1490589 They died peacefully.
You should be grateful.

1497054 1501559 parents and my sister,
we went to Paddington Station,

1504186 1509525 hoping maybe we could get on a plane,
maybe we could buy our way onto a plane.
1510151 1512528 I remember my dad had all this cash,
1512612 1515948 even though cash was completely useless.
1517491 1520620 About 20,000 other people had the same idea.
1526167 1528502 I lost my grip on my sister's hand.
1530671 1533007 I remember the ground was soft.

1534967 1539347 I looked down
and I was standing on all these people.
1539430 1543392 Like a carpet. People who had fallen and...

1543476 1547438 Somewhere in the crowd
there were Infected. It spread fast.

1547521 1550858 No one could run.
All you could do was climb.

1552485 1555571 Climb over more people.
So I did that. I climbed.
1555655 1558032 And I got up on top of this kiosk.

1560326 1565289 Looking down, you couldn't tell
which faces were infected and which weren't.

1565373 1569251 Then I saw my dad.
Not my mum or my sister.

1583349 1588521 We don't have time to get back to the shop
before dark. We should stay here tonight.

1591190 1594026 My room's up at the top.
You two can have that.
1594110 1597446 No, we'll all sleep in the same room. It's safer.
1700132 1702426 Give me a drink of that, will ya?
1711310 1713396 I'll start working on them, then.

1746846 1749807 - That's Mr Bridges.
- Were you bitten?
1749890 1752101 And his daughter. From four doors down.
1755354 1758274 Did any of the blood get in your mouth?
1796145 1798230 Do you have any clothes here?

1801317 1804987 Then get them and get dressed.
We have to leave now.

1805071 1808741 More Infected will be coming.
They always do.

1837520 1840523 How did you know?
How did you know he was infected?

1840606 1844527 - The blood.
- There was blood on me. It was on you.

1844610 1849991 I didn't know he was infected.
He knew. I could see it in his face.

1850074 1854495 If someone gets infected,
you've about 20 seconds to kill them.

1854578 1859709 It might be your brother, your sister
or your oldest friend. It makes no difference.

1859792 1865214 Just so you know where you stand,
if it happens to you, I'll do it in a heartbeat.

1865298 1869510 He was full of plans.
Have you got any plans, Jim?

1869594 1874056 Do you want us to find a cure and
save the world or just fall in love and fuck?
1876726 1879312 Staying alive's as good as it gets.

1938037 1941165 What is it about tower blocks
and shopping trolleys?
1941248 1944335 Stop talking. It's a long way up.
1962270 1964355 Now I do need a break.

1984125 1989422 - Why didn't you say something before?
- I didn't think you'd give a shit.

1990631 1994885 You've got no fat on you
and all you've had to eat is sugar.
1997179 1999432 There isn't a lot we can do about that

1999515 2004604 except pump you full of painkillers
and give you more sugar. As for sugar,

2010318 2013362 Actually,
I did have a can of Tango somewhere.

2090731 2093734 - Open the fucking door!
- Where's Dad?
2093818 2096112 Let them in, Hannah. Let them inside.

2129520 2132607 - Selena.
- Selena. Good to meet you.
2147872 2150166 Calls for a celebration, I'd say.
2150249 2153294 Why don't you all sit down and...
2153377 2156339 Hannah, what have we got to offer?
2156422 2158925 We've got Mum's creme de menthe.

2169894 2172897 - Where are the bloody glasses?
- Middle cupboard.
2172980 2175858 Nah, the good ones. It's a celebration.
2198631 2201717 I know it isn't much but, well, cheers.

2230538 2236127 Sorry we couldn't spare the water.
Same with the toilet. The flush doesn't work.
2237795 2240047 You'll have to use the bucket.
2246596 2249223 Have to empty it each morning.

2249307 2252977 Just chuck it over the balcony.
No mod cons here.
2254854 2257982 Listen, it's late. We're gonna turn in.
2271329 2273706 I'll take the living room. It's fine.

2310409 2314121 - So what do you make of them?
- Well, they're desperate.
2315247 2318084 Probably need us more than we need them.

2329387 2334058 You should be more concerned about
whether they're gonna slow you down.

2334141 2337895 - Because if they slowed you down...
- I'd leave them behind.

2342358 2345903 Then you're gonna wind up
getting yourself killed.
2361961 2365214 You think I don't get it, but I do get it.

2367091 2371095 And I know I'd be dead already
if I hadn't met you.
2403294 2405379 We lost water pressure three weeks ago.

2405463 2409592 I thought we'd be OK with the water
from the other flats. Cisterns and tanks.

2409675 2412887 But it vanishes so quick
you wouldn't believe.

2429362 2433616 You can set up a plastic sheet
to catch dew and condensation.
2433699 2437453 Saw it on TV once, but I can't make it work.
2453511 2456639 Jim, we're not going to be able to stay here.

2465564 2469318 - There's been no broadcasts for weeks.
- Just listen.

2469402 2473990 Salvation is here.
The answer to Infection is here.
2474073 2477076 if you can hear this, you're not alone.

2477159 2481664 There are others like you.
There are other survivors.
2481747 2483958 We are soldiers and we are armed.

2487420 2492008 - Quiet. There's more.
- Our location is the 42nd blockade, M602,

2495595 2499515 - You must find us. Salvation is...
- Now it just repeats.

2499599 2501976 - It's a recording?
- Yeah, it's a recording.
2502059 2504979 But this is where it's telling us to go.

2508733 2513529 The way things are, we might need
two or three days to get up there.

2519410 2525499 Sound carries in this flat. Me and Hannah
do need you more than you need us.

2525583 2528753 - Look, I didn't...
- No, it's OK. It's the truth.
2528836 2531339 I can't leave the block if it's the two of us.

2531422 2535384 Something might happen to me.
Hannah'd be alone. I couldn't risk it.

2537261 2541557 If it's a recording,
the soldiers who made it could be dead.

2541641 2545144 - It's possible.
- That stuff about the answer to Infection...

2545227 2549523 There is no answer!
It's already done all the damage it can!

2549607 2552443 - Maybe they have a cure.
- Maybe they've got nothing.

2552526 2556614 - The only way to find out is to reach them.
- We could die trying, Frank!

2561077 2566791 And anyway, it isn't true what Dad said.
You need us just the same as we need you.

2570253 2575549 And we'll never be safe in the cities.
The soldiers could keep us safe.
2576259 2578344 So we have to try and get there.

2592483 2596237 Just so you know,
I don't take cheques or credit cards.

2624807 2627810 - What do you think?
- It's the most direct route.

2627893 2633149 Then we should take the indirect route.
The one in daylight and not underground.
2650750 2653252 No. See, this is a really shit idea.

2654128 2657506 You know why?
Because it's obviously a shit idea.

2657590 2661969 So we're gonna drive into the tunnel
full of fucking smashed cars...
2662053 2664972 It's really fucking obviously a shit idea!
2700633 2703052 The world's worst place to get a flat.
2703135 2706472 Agreed. I think we'd better do this quick.
2708975 2711143 I've got the wheel. You're on the jack.

2725741 2729287 Do you hear that?
Hey, hey, do you hear that?

2761277 2765573 Forget the jack, Hannah.
There's no time. Just lift, everyone.
2765656 2768909 Grab hold! One, two, three, lift!

2775374 2780504 - Don't look at them! Don't look!
- I can see them! They're coming!

2791390 2794310 - Get the tyre on, Hannah!
- I'm trying.

2807698 2810159 - Get in the car!
- Come on!

2886652 2890239 Don't take anything
that needs to be cooked, OK?
2890323 2892158 I think you can eat that raw.

2899832 2904337 If I never see another chocolate bar again,
it'll be too soon.

2909050 2912678 Now, single malt,
16-year-old, dark, full flavour.
2920770 2924023 Takes out the fire but leaves in the warmth.
2978911 2981998 Either we do this now or we're walking.

3034216 3036886 Like going on holidays
with your aunt!

3135026 3137820 - Find anything, Jim?
- No! Let's get outta here.
3213771 3216774 I can, like, taste the vitamin C.
3217608 3220403 Mmmm, the raisins are so moist.

3281714 3285426 That you'll never hear
another piece of original music again.

3285509 3289680 You'll never read a book
that hasn't already been written,
3290723 3294560 or see a film that hasn't already been shot.
3299065 3302318 Um... that's what you were thinking.
3305529 3307823 I was thinking I was wrong.

3319252 3323756 It doesn't really mean anything
to Frank and Hannah because...

3325132 3328594 Well, she's got her dad
and he's got his daughter. So...

3331264 3334892 I was wrong when I said
staying alive is as good as it gets.
3338521 3341023 See, that's what I was thinking.

3358791 3362795 It's getting late.
We'd better stay here for the night.
3391115 3393784 Selena didn't seem to have any trouble.

3410593 3414472 Bloody hell. Must've needed
a hell of a prescription for that lot.

3414555 3418851 I didn't need a prescription.
I qualified as a chemist.
3421562 3424148 Not only will we be able to get to sleep

3424231 3427944 but if we're attacked in the middle
of the night, we won't even care.

3428027 3430279 - Two each.
- Not for me, thanks.
3442750 3445461 Come on, Frank. Let her live a little.

3446545 3450549 - Give her half of one.
- All right. We're on.
3527460 3530254 You're having a bad dream, that's all.

3585559 3589063 - Did I miss breakfast?
- You'll sleep through anything.

3589146 3594151 - Did you have a fry-up?
- We'll stop at a pub on the way. Door!

3618718 3623222 Our location is the
42nd blockade, the M602,
3630688 3633733 The answer to Infection is here.
3670061 3673439 The whole of Manchester, the whole city.
3675274 3677610 No fire crews to put it out.

3808574 3812578 I don't understand, Dad.
Did they leave?

3812662 3815790 - I don't like this. I think we should go.
- No!

3822630 3827468 Vehicles. We should check the vehicles.
There has to be something.

3943876 3946796 - Dad?
- Keep away from me! Keep away from me!
3946879 3949382 Keep away! Keep away! Keep away!
4012612 4015281 Three survivors. One male, two female.
4015364 4018701 I repeat, one male, two female.

4083516 4088396 Well, we've got beds with clean sheets
and a boiler that produces hot water.
4088479 4090898 So you can all have a shower.
4090982 4094318 You look like you need one. Please.

4114255 4119468 It ain't funny. I got loads of cooking to do,
you fucking Doris!
4128269 4131439 She's lost her dad, Jim. That's how she is.

4143743 4147330 Oh, don't do that.
Come on, come on, come on.

4151167 4156172 Hannah is what Frank says she is. Tough,
strong, and she'll cope just like I'll cope.

4156255 4160176 - Just like you'll cope.
- I don't want her to have to fucking cope.
4161469 4163888 I want her to be OK.
4165473 4167642 When Hannah had her dad it was OK.
4167725 4170519 It was OK for them and it was OK for us.

4210643 4214146 - Yeah, we did.
- We must be a disappointment.

4214230 4220361 You were hoping for a full brigade. An army
base with helicopters and a field hospital.

4222780 4226951 - We were just hoping for...
- The answer to Infection.

4231455 4235960 As I said before, it's here. Though
it may not be quite what you imagined.

4236335 4239255 - Just feel lucky to have found you.
- You were lucky.

4239338 4242466 The fire drove hundreds of Infected
out of Manchester.
4242550 4245636 The surrounding area's teeming with them.

4255688 4261569 Flat terrain all round the house. Floodlights
which we've rigged up to a generator.

4265281 4269535 And we've been lacing the ground
with tripwires and land mines.

4269619 4274290 You wouldn't want to mow the lawn,
but if they get in, we hear them.

4277543 4282465 Secondary to protection,
our real job is to rebuild. Start again.
4282548 4284967 The belly of the house. The heart.

4285051 4290306 A wood-fired boiler providing us with hot
water. The first step towards civilisation.
4292558 4294685 Here you are. I'll swap you.

4294769 4297980 - Now don't be throwing it.
- Here, give us some.

4298064 4302109 Don't be fighting.
Will you put that back? Put it back.

4304654 4307657 - What are you cooking, Jones?
- Surprise, sir.

4332056 4337144 Mitchell managed to knock him out cold
and we got a chain round his neck.

4344819 4348864 The idea was to learn something
about Infection.
4371554 4374974 He's telling me he'll never bake bread.

4386611 4391991 And eventually he'll tell me how long
the Infected take to starve to death.
4431739 4434200 You'll have to wait and see
4436619 4439205 We hope it's chips, it's chips
4455596 4458975 Tinned ham, tinned peas, tinned beans and...

4466565 4469026 - It's a feast, Jones.
- Honour of our guests.
4469110 4472321 Absolutely. I was going to propose a toast
4472405 4475533 but this omelette will do just as well.

4491090 4495011 Jones, did you notice while cooking
that these eggs were off?
4495094 4498514 I thought the salt might cover the taste, sir.
4505479 4508274 I don't suppose you can cook, can you?

4509108 4514572 I can't tell you how badly we need
someone with a little flair in the kitchen.

4514655 4519201 What a fucking disappointment.
I saw those eggs, I thought it was Christmas.

4519285 4522538 We'll have eggs again.
Once everything's back to normal.
4522622 4525458 You muppet! Look at him, eh?

4525541 4529587 He's still waiting
for Marks and Spencer's to reopen.

4529670 4534008 - You don't know nothing.
- I think Bill's got a point.
4534091 4537219 If you look at the whole life of the planet,

4539305 4543434 you know, Man has only been around
for a few blinks of an eye.
4544185 4546646 So if the infection wipes us all out,
4547647 4549941 that is a return to normality.

4553945 4556948 - That what you meant, Bill?
- Yeah, yeah.
4557031 4560284 Have you met our New Age sergeant?

4563162 4568376 Tell me, Farrell, exactly why
did you join the army in the first place?

4571170 4575299 This is what I've seen
in the four weeks since Infection.

4578094 4582640 Which is what I saw in the four weeks before
Infection, the four weeks before that...

4582723 4588187 As far back as I care to remember,
people killing people.

4588271 4591899 Which to my mind
puts us in a state of normality now.

4600199 4603160 - You're not eating?
- I don't want to eat.

4606122 4609375 I don't want to eat.
I want to bury my dad.
4610293 4613421 He's one of the people you're talking about.
4617508 4619552 Let's go, let's go, let's go!

4671354 4674982 What do you want, a fucking sweetie?
Keep shooting, you cunt!
4691666 4693960 I ain't never seen that in my life!

4716607 4722238 Listen, sweetheart, you ain't
gonna be needing this any more.
4722321 4724532 Cos you got me to protect you now.

4726325 4731622 You wanna get your hands on a really
big chopper, you just come and see me.

4733249 4735418 - That's an offer, Mitch.
- Give her some.

4741632 4746137 Easy, tiger. You don't wanna go
picking a fight with me, son.

4753853 4756897 - Mitchell, first action on.
- Resecure the perimeter.
4756981 4760443 Then get to it. Jones, Bedford, go with him.
4770912 4773623 Clear the bodies off the lawn.
4776500 4779086 The rest of you, go with him.

4801484 4805696 We're very grateful for your protection
but if we're gonna stay here...

4805780 4807323 - Who have you killed?
- No one.

4807406 4812578 Who have you killed? You wouldn't be alive
now if you hadn't killed somebody.
4819835 4822964 I killed... I killed a boy.

4834600 4839397 But you had to.
Otherwise he'd have killed you.

4860376 4864171 Eight days ago I found Jones
with his gun in his mouth.

4865339 4870052 He said he was going to kill himself
because there was no future.
4870136 4873014 What could I say to him?

4873097 4878311 We fight off the Infected or we wait
until they starve to death and then what?

4879228 4883065 What do nine men do
except wait to die themselves?

4883149 4889280 I moved us from the blockade, I set the radio
broadcasting and I promised them women.

4906839 4908633 - What is it?
- We have to go.

4908716 4910801 - Jim, wait!
- No time! Come on!
4916933 4918893 We get in the car and we go!

4920269 4924815 No! You're not going to keep them here!
You've got to let them go!

4924899 4928152 You can't keep them here!
Stay where you are!
4928236 4930947 I'm not gonna let you keep them here!
4944877 4947213 I want to give you a chance.
4951050 4953344 But I can't let them go.

4981414 4984166 Smithers says
"Women and semen don't mix."

4984250 4987169 And Mr Burns says
"We all know what you think, Smithers."

4987253 4990172 And that was my favourite joke
in The Simpsons.

4990256 4993884 That's what they're doing a few
hundred miles away, across the Channel,

4993968 4998389 across the Atlantic. Eating dinner
and watching the fucking Simpsons!

4998472 5001767 They're sleeping in their beds
next to their wives.

5001851 5007565 But we're here chained to a fucking radiator
because the OC has gone insane!

5008608 5012653 Starting the world again when the rest
of the world hasn't even stopped.
5014030 5017158 Just imagine, just think about it.
5018200 5020494 How could Infection cross the oceans?

5020578 5024874 How could it cross the mountains
and the rivers? It can be stopped.

5024957 5027668 Right now TVs are playing
and planes are flying

5027752 5031756 and the rest of the world
is continuing as fucking normal.

5036052 5039639 What would you do
with a diseased little island?

5048397 5052777 "There is no Infection.
It's just people killing people." He's insane!

5099323 5102451 - Please...
- Believe me, I'm not interested.

5103536 5108666 You see, I'm gonna have the black one.
And I'm gonna make her squirm.

5108749 5112670 Mitchell, I swear to God
it's gonna end badly for you.
5116507 5118593 Get up, you cunt! Fucking move!

5143576 5146996 Come on then, you fucking
pansies. Do me first.
5147079 5149582 No, Mitch. Mitch, just use the gat.

5149665 5152710 - So you're gonna stick me?
- Shoot 'em!

5155546 5158591 Is that how you'd let
your sergeant go out, Jones?

5158674 5160593 - I'll shoot them!
- No, you won't.

5160676 5164138 You'll let him stick me?
Like a fucking dog?

5173439 5177401 You stupid cunt! What are you doing?
You wanna shoot me?

5177485 5181656 - You wanna shoot me? I'll kill you!
- Where's he fucking gone?
5182907 5185743 Fuck it! Get up! Get after him!

5188246 5191457 - Jones, move it!
- I can see him! I can see him!

5201217 5203135 - Can you see him?
- Through there!
5218609 5222071 He's over the wall. He's got no vehicle.

5261110 5265072 The first thing we're going to do
is make you look more presentable.

5265156 5268743 The lady of the house
has an extensive wardrobe
5268826 5271370 which she certainly has no use for.
5272371 5274206 You can't do it to Hannah.

5274290 5278002 Go to the master bedroom,
pick out a wide selection.

5291515 5294310 - It's only dressing up!
- No! Selena!

5294393 5297730 - I thought girls liked dressing up.
- Expensive dresses.

5316499 5320628 You need to leave me alone
with Hannah. OK?

5322505 5326217 - Listen, right. The OC wants...
- He wants us to dress up nice.

5326300 5330471 If you want us to get changed,
you have to leave the room. OK?
5354245 5357123 Come on, lads. Let's leave the room.

5380187 5384150 We're gonna eat these, Hannah, OK?
Come on. Eat these.
5384233 5386402 Are you trying to kill me?
5388821 5391365 I'm making you not care. OK?
5403336 5406005 Stay here and put the dresses on.

5411844 5414430 He went over the wall.
We thought he'd be dead.
5644493 5646954 It sounded like a Claymore to me.

5647997 5651959 All right, I'll go and hit the floods,
take a butcher's.
5654712 5657340 keep an eye on him, will ya?
5670519 5673022 I think they're having an effect.

5688579 5691457 What are you gonna do
if they don't come back?
5692208 5695294 Would you be the officer if Henry was dead?
5695378 5697380 Is that the way it works?

5700925 5705012 I don't think they are coming back.
I think they've been killed.

5723948 5727076 We're gonna get out of here.
Stay with it, Hannah.
5727159 5729996 Don't worry. I feel fine. Really.

5752059 5757607 Oi! Where the fuck are you going?
What's all the fucking shouting about?

5765573 5768951 Dont just stand there,
you soppy cunt! Get after them!
5791390 5794352 What the fuck you gonna do now?

5820920 5824674 - Defend these stairs with your fucking life!
- Hannah!

6003394 6007773 I haven't got any bullets.
I haven't got any fucking bullets!

6071170 6075967 It's just you and me now, darlin'.
But don't worry, I'll get you out of here.

6076050 6080513 Then we'll find a nice little fucking place
somewhere. Just you and me.
6080596 6082932 And we'll live happy ever after, eh?
6147288 6149790 That was longer than a heartbeat.
6164055 6167600 Listen. Listen. It's not all fucked.
6173356 6175858 We're gonna be OK. It's not all fucked.

6175942 6179278 - I've got to explain something.
- Shut up.
6187787 6191374 Hannah, it's OK! He's not infected.
6191457 6193542 But I thought he was biting you.
6193626 6196295 I was kissing her. Are you stoned?
6198631 6200758 We have to get out of here. Come on!
6299065 6301484 Come on, Jim, breathe! Fucking breathe!
6395202 6397872 You looked all right in this, you know.

6419518 6422855 - I can't hear anything!
- I told you, I heard it!
6478327 6481247 Do you think he saw us this time?
